name: A and Z
description:
A platformer where you play two Characters. Created for the GB30-Jam from 8-bits to Infinity.

Story

A-3.2 and Z-2.4 are two testsubjects in a mysterious facility. One day they decide that they can escape if they work together hard enough.

Gameplay

A-3.2 (A) and Z-2.4 (Z) have different sets of abilities. A is fast and Z is strong. Press "select"/"minus" to switch between them. A can walljump and dash. Z on the other hand can punch and doesn't take any damage from enemies.

Credits

Hygoto - Art, Leveldesign

Stegoratops - Coding, Music, Animation
